description: Episode number 17 of Series "The Worlds of childhood". Explores the nature and functions of friendship, focusing on the role of peer relationships and games with rules, in the development of morality. Highlights research on gender differences in middle childhood through observation of Guatamalan girls washing clothes, Baka boys helping their fathers fell trees and girls around the world playing handclapping games.
